response.explain: The execution error indicates that the fridge is already open, so the action to open the fridge is unnecessary. The original subtask 1 can be skipped and we can proceed to the next subtask.
response.subtask:
(1) Take out the bacon from the fridge.
(2) Put the bacon on the griddle.
(3) Turn on the stove to cook the bacon.
